database.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_googleproject}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `globalId` VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, `pageId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `name` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, `secret` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `globalId` (`globalId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_googleproject_commit}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `globalId` VARCHAR(36), `projectId` INT(10), `authorId` INT(10), `revision` INT(10), `url` VARCHAR(256), `message` VARCHAR(512), `commitDate` DATETIME, `date` DATETIME, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `globalId` (`globalId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_googleproject_author}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` INT(10), `name` VARCHAR(32), `date` DATETIME, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

INSERT INTO `{table.amun_user_activity_template}` (`type`, `verb`, `table`, `path`, `summary`) VALUES ('INSERT', 'add', 'amun_service_googleproject_commit', '', '

{user.name} has commited r{record.revision}

{record.message}
');

INSERT INTO `{table.amun_user_right}` (`name`, `description`) VALUES ('service_googleproject_view', 'Service Googleproject view'), ('service_googleproject_add', 'Service Googleproject add'), ('service_googleproject_edit', 'Service Googleproject edit'), ('service_googleproject_delete', 'Service Googleproject delete'), ('service_googleproject_author_view', 'Service Googleproject Author view'), ('service_googleproject_author_add', 'Service Googleproject Author add'), ('service_googleproject_author_edit', 'Service Googleproject Author edit'), ('service_googleproject_author_delete', 'Service Googleproject Author delete');
